title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 53.4 - Pilot station at eastern end of Block Island Sound
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 53.4 - Pilot station at eastern end of Block Island Sound

State Regulations

Long Island Sound-Block Island Sound pilots assigned to
vessels arriving or departing at the eastern end of Block Island Sound shall
board or leave vessels at a convenient and safe location where adequate boat
service is available. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
53.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
